document.docAuthor: Williams, Bronwyn W. & Weaver, Patricia G.
document.masterDocTitle: A historical review of the taxonomy and classification of Entocytheridae (Crustacea: Ostracoda: Podocopida)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A historical review of the taxonomy and classification of Entocytheridae (Crustacea: Ostracoda: Podocopida)

subSubSection.paragraph: 1961 Entocytheridae .—Moore: Q96, Q98, first time appears as family (C, T).
1961 Entocytheridae .—Howe & Sylvester-Bradley: Q255, Q257, elevated to family (C, T).
1961 Entocytheridae Hoff, 1942 .—Howe: Q300, elevated to family (nom. transl.), Fig. 226 (D, T).
1962 Entocytheridae Hoff 1942 .—Hart: 121 [and as Entocytherinae ], 122 [and as Entocytherinae ], 123 [as Entocytherinae Hoff 1942], 124, 125, 126, 139, expanded diagnosis (C, T).
1964 Entocytherinae Hoff, 1942.—Hartmann: 586, 589 [as part of progress report and discussion following paper] (C, T).
1973 Entocytheridae .—McKenzie: 143, 144, 147 [and as Entocytheri d ae, lapsus calami ] (C, D, H, R).
1974 Entocytheridae Hoff, 1942 .—Hart & Hart: vii, 1, 14, 15, 16, 17 (C, K, T).
1998 Entocytheridae .—Horne, Danielopol & Martens: 162, 168, 169, 174, Fig. 10.7 (C, E, T).
2000 Entocytheridae Hoff, 1942 .—Meisch: 33, 45, 424, 464 (C, D, H, R, T).
2012 Entocytheridae Hoff 1942 .—Karanovic: xii, 4, 59, 60 [as Enthocytheridae, erroneous spelling], 62, 63, 91, 95, 115–116 [erroneous mention of Fig. 8b] (C, E, H, K, T).
2014a Entocytheridae .—Mestre, Monrós & Mesquita-Joanes: 925, 926, 927, 929, 930, 931, 932, Figs. 1 –4 (C, D, H).

Remarks: Family Entocytheridae was established in Howe (1961). Hart (1962) expanded the diagnosis for the taxon, and it has since remained largely unmodified. Prior to 1961, “
Entocythere
” was used in a manner that might refer to the genus
Entocythere
, subgenus
Entocythere
, or what would ultimately become the subfamily, Entocytherinae Hoff, 1942; Entocytherinae referred to, in part, what was to become the family. Hobbs (1953: 181) erroneously referred to “...ostracods of the family Entocytheridae ...” (perhaps) unintentionally foreshadowing establishment of the family by Howe (1961).
